question:
Which of the following is the vector of the Zika virus?
1) Aedes Egypti
2) Aedes Albopictus
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Zika virus is a mosquito-borne disease that was first identified in Uganda in 1947 in monkeys. The disease caused by the Zika virus is spread through mosquito bites. Aedes Egypti & Aedes Albopictus are the vector of the Zika virus.
